DOC.brief_summary: This multi-center , prospective , randomize trial standard care vs. standard care + pegfilgrastim ( Neulasta® ) among patient clinical diagnosis alcoholic hepatitis DF≥32 .
DOC.detailed_description: Standard care treatment either prednisolone 40 mg/day 28 day pentoxifylline 400 mg TID 28 day . The patient 's physician decide standard care treatment patient receive . Patients randomize ( 1:1 ) receive either additional drug treatment ( SOC group ) receive pegfilgrastim ( Neulasta® , 6 mg ) SQ . Patients see in-person screening , randomization ( Day 1 ) , Day 8 , Day 29 , Week 12 , Week 24 . Safety examination blood test perform . In addition , biological specimen save research purpose time point . Total duration patient participation 24 week .
DOC.criteria: A clinical diagnosis alcoholic hepatitis Maddrey 's discriminant function score ≥32 . Age 18 year old . Renal failure ( creatinine > 2.0 mg/dl ) Bilirubin < 5 mg/dL uncontrolled recent upper gastrointestinal bleeding Known HIV infection Uncontrolled infection , pregnant .
